org.forgerock.openam.entitlement

Class PrivilegeEvaluatorContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.PrivilegeEvaluatorContext

  • public class PrivilegeEvaluatorContext
extends Object
    Holds the context of the policy evaluation making it available to policy conditions.
    See Also:
